speech:
"I've been working on a medium-intensity aerobic exercise for 11 weeks during the period of quitting smoking
The results show that exercise suppresses your desire to smoke."
If you're at work, try stretching!
I recommend walking or taking a walk.
Why don't you try riding a bike?

"I recommend weight training. If you do weight training,
Studies have shown that the success rate of smoking cessation doubles."

When you exercise, dopamine, a neurotransmitter related to joy,
You can find fewer cigarettes because it's secreted and makes you feel better. I recommend aerobic exercise.

How about swimming?
It helps you build up your physical strength and refresh your mind and body
It's a good exercise
